<h1>PGN Parser Description</h1> <p>This parser supports the PGN format based on: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portable_Game_Notation" target="_blank">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portable_Game_Notation</a></p> <p>The movetext is based on SAN (Standard Algebraic Notation).</p> <p>Disambiguation is supported by checking VerifyIfKingBeingCheck before accepting a move.</p> <p>PGN file format error detection.</p> <p>Output format:</p> <p>The state of the board at the end of the game, in the form of an 8x8 grid.</p> <h2>Initial State</h2> <pre class="chess-board"> bR|bN|bB|bQ|bK|bB|bN|bR bP|bP|bP|bP|bP|bP|bP|bP | | | | | | |
| | | | | | |
| | | | | | |
| | | | | | |
wP|wP|wP|wP|wP|wP|wP|wP wR|wN|wB|wQ|wK|wB|wN|wR <h2>Input</h2> <pre> e4 e6
e5 f6
exf6 gxf6
Ke2 h6
Ke3 h5
Ke4 e5
Nh3 d6
Ng5 Be6
Nf3 Bh3
Nc3 Bxg2
Na4 b6
Nc5 b5
Nd3 b4
Nxe5 b3 1/2-1/2 bR|bN| |bQ|bK|bB|bN|bR bP| |bP| | | | |
| | |bP| |bP| |
| | | |wN| | |bP | | | |wK| | |
|bP| | | |wN| |
wP|wP|wP|wP| |wP|bB|wP wR| |wB|wQ| |wB| |wR <h2>Technical Implementation</h2> <p>Runtime polymorphism in class <code>Move</code>;</p> <p>Dispatch using <code>std::variant</code>, <code>std::visit</code>, and CRTP (Curiously Recurring Template Pattern) in <code>template &lt;typename ConcretePiece&gt; class BasePiece</code>;</p>
title: PGN (Portable Game Notation) Parser
